name: cncf-interactive-landscape
description: Interactive visualization of cloud native projects and products

scripts.build: rm -rf landscapeapp;git clone https://github.com/cncf/landscapeapp; export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD"; cd landscapeapp; yarn; yarn build
scripts.build2: npm config set scripts-prepend-node-path true; export PROJECT_PATH="$PWD"; npm explore interactive-landscape -- npm run build

author: CNCF
